data.comment: In the minute -5, Victor (Atletico Mineiro) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The match has started at Neo Quimica Arena.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 3, Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Corinthians's half.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
In the minute 4, Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
Guilherme Arana of Atletico Mineiro smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 6, Goal! Corinthians have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Davo.
Ramiro instrumental with a fine assist.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Corinthians.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In Sao Paulo Atletico Mineiro attack through Federico Zaracho. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 10, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Corinthians a goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 12, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Everaldo (Corinthians) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Cassio is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Corinthians's Cassio is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 18, Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Corinthians.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards the away team a throw-in.
Eduardo Vargas (Atletico Mineiro) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Corinthians.
Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 22, Atletico Mineiro's Federico Zaracho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Corinthians.
In the minute 25, Fagner (Corinthians) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Corinthians to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
In the minute 26, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Corinthians just outside Atletico Mineiro's area.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
Atletico Mineiro are pushing forward but Keno's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 28, Corinthians have a goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro push upfield but Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira quickly pulls them for offside.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Corinthians throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Keno (Atletico Mineiro) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 32, Throw-in Corinthians.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 33, Roni Medeiros de Moura for Corinthians has been booked by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira and receives a first yellow card.
Atletico Mineiro's Eduardo Sasha breaks free at Neo Quimica Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Corinthians drive upfield and Everaldo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atletico Mineiro defender.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 39, Play has been interrupted briefly in Sao Paulo to check on Ramiro, who is grimacing with pain.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Ramiro is back on his feet again.
In the minute 41, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Jair of Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 45, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Corinthians a goal kick.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Luan for Corinthians gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Neo Quimica Arena.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Atletico Mineiro close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 51, Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Gabriel (Corinthians) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 54, Corinthians have a goal kick.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 56, Davo (Corinthians) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Corinthians.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 60, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Corinthians's half.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Guilherme Arana grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Neo Quimica Arena.
In the minute 61, Eduardo Vargas with an assist there.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards the away team a throw-in.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
In the minute 64, Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Corinthians's half?
Free kick in a good position for Atletico Mineiro!
Leo Natel is replacing Everaldo for the home team.
In the minute 67, Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 68, Jair (Atletico Mineiro) has received a yellow card from Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
The away team replace Federico Zaracho with Nathan.
Atletico Mineiro make their second substitution with Marrony replacing Eduardo Sasha.
In the minute 71, Eduardo Vargas of Atletico Mineiro is pulled up for offside.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 73, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Important block from the Corinthians defence as Eduardo Vargas fires in a strike for Atletico Mineiro.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 74, Nathan gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atletico Mineiro.
Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 76, Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Ederson is replacing Roni Medeiros de Moura for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
In the minute 77, Jonathan Cafu is on a sub for Davo for Corinthians.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Corinthians's half.
In the minute 78, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
In the minute 80, Corinthians are coming forward and Luan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 81, Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Goal! Atletico Mineiro have got their heads in front thanks to a Marrony strike.
That's a fine assist from Keno.
In the minute 85, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Corinthians.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team replace Ramiro with Angelo Araos.
Victor Cantillo is on a sub for Gabriel for Corinthians.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
Corinthians will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 89, Eduardo Vargas is booked for the away team.
Atletico Mineiro make their third substitution with Bueno replacing Eduardo Vargas.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Neo Quimica Arena the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Throw-in Corinthians.
Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
That's full-time at Neo Quimica Arena. The final score is 1-2.
Hyoran is replacing Keno for the away team.
Ramiro (Corinthians) has received a first yellow card.
Rever (Atletico Mineiro) has received a first yellow card.
